amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting Medicare and Medicaid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2035 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 51 - 48. Record Vote Number: 170.

action.text: Amendment SA 2035 proposed by Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 1717.
